<script>
function onload02() {
    var windowHeight01 = window.innerHeight;
    var h01 = windowHeight01.toString();
    h01 = h01 + "px";
    document.body.style.height = h01;
    document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    document.body.style.background = "";
    document.body.style.backgroundImage = "linear-gradient(gray, black)";
    document.getElementById("text301").focus();
    var text01 = "Show a grid, open a door, and move the pyramid.";
    document.getElementById("p301").innerHTML = text01;
    document.getElementById("text301").value = "";
    localStorage.setItem("ifRunAlready", "0");
    blockHeight01();
    textPut01();
}
function verify01(textToType01, textTyped01) {
var textToType01 = document.getElementById("p301").innerHTML;
var textTyped01 = document.getElementById("text301").value;
var l01 = textTyped01.split("");
l01 = l01.length;
l01 = Number(l01);
//if(l01 >= 35){alert(textTyped01 + "\n\n" + textToType01);}
    if(textToType01 == textTyped01) {
        var ifRun01 = localStorage.getItem("ifRunAlready");
        localStorage.setItem("ifRunAlready", "true");
        if(ifRun01 == "true") {return null;}
        else if(ifRun01 != "true") {
//alert("true " + ifRun01);
            grid01b();
        }
    }
}
function blockHeight01() {
    var windowHeight01 = window.innerHeight;
    var h01 = windowHeight01.toString();
    h01 = h01 + "px";
    document.getElementById("block01").style.height = h01;    
}
function grid01b() {
    var i, length01, grid01html;
    var width01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientWidth;
    width01 = Number(width01);
    width01 = width01 / 10;
    var width01px = width01 + "px";
    var height01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientHeight;
    height01 = Number(height01);
    height01 = height01 / 4;
    var height01px = height01 + "px";
    //alert("alert1 \n\n width " + width01 + "\n\n height " + height01);
    var style01 = "style=\"width: " + width01px + "; height: " + height01px + 
    "; background-color: black; opacity: .7; border: 0px dotted gray; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; z-index: 2;";
    //(width01 / 10) * 4;  add 40 + 1 = 41 because I want the id to start with i = 1, verus i = 0 which would make the id be : 
    //"id = gridCell00;" whereas, as I said, I want the id to start at the number 1, not at the number 0.
    length01 = 41; 
    length02 = length01 - 1;
    length03 = length01 - 2;
    grid01html = "";
    var id01, top01, left01, i02, i03, val01, test01;
    for(i = 1; i < length01; i++) {
        id01 = "gridCell0" + i;
        i02 = i - 1;
        val01 = i02 / 10;
        val01 = val01.toString();
        test01 = val01.search(".");
        if(test01 == 0) {val01 = val01.split("."); val01 = val01[0];}
        else if(test01 == -1) {alert("test01 " + test01); val01 = val01;}
        val01 = Number(val01);
        top01 = height01 * val01 + "px";
        i02 = (i - 1)-(val01 * 10);
        i03 = i + 1;
        left01 = i02 * width01 + "px";
        if(i==1){grid01html += "<div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= 2 && i <= length03) {grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= length02){grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div>";}

/*
//to use id's of grid cells:
        if(i==1){grid01html += "<div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= 2 && i <= length03) {grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= length02){grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div>";}

        setTimeout(function() {alert("ok");
        }, 2000); 
*/
    }
    document.getElementById("block01").style.opacity = "1";
    document.getElementById("block01").style.backgroundColor = "transparent";
    document.getElementById("block01").innerHTML = grid01html;
    repeatGSC01(0);
//developer code tests here
//    document.getElementById("t001").value = grid01html;
    appendAttempt01(grid01html); 
    openDoor01();
//alert("2");
}
function grid01() {
alert("1");
    var i, length01, grid01html;
    var width01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientWidth;
    width01 = Number(width01);
    width01 = width01 / 10;
    var width01px = width01 + "px";
    var height01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientHeight;
    height01 = Number(height01);
    height01 = height01 / 4;
    var height01px = height01 + "px";
    //alert("alert1 \n\n width " + width01 + "\n\n height " + height01);
    var style01 = "style=\"width: " + width01px + "; height: " + height01px + 
    "; background-color: black; opacity: .7; border: 0px dotted gray; position: absolute; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; z-index: 2;";
    //(width01 / 10) * 4;  add 40 + 1 = 41 because I want the id to start with i = 1, verus i = 0 which would make the id be : 
    //"id = gridCell00;" whereas, as I said, I want the id to start at the number 1, not at the number 0.
    length01 = 41; 
    length02 = length01 - 1;
    length03 = length01 - 2;
    grid01html = "";
    var id01, top01, left01, i02, i03, val01, test01;
    for(i = 1; i < length01; i++) {
        id01 = "gridCell0" + i;
        i02 = i - 1;
        val01 = i02 / 10;
        val01 = val01.toString();
        test01 = val01.search(".");
        if(test01 == 0) {val01 = val01.split("."); val01 = val01[0];}
        else if(test01 == -1) {alert("test01 " + test01); val01 = val01;}
        val01 = Number(val01);
        top01 = height01 * val01 + "px";
        i02 = (i - 1)-(val01 * 10);
        i03 = i + 1;
        left01 = i02 * width01 + "px";
        if(i==1){grid01html += "<div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= 2 && i <= length03) {grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= length02){grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"></div>";}

/*
//to use id's of grid cells:
        if(i==1){grid01html += "<div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= 2 && i <= length03) {grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div><!--";}
        else if(i >= length02){grid01html += "--><div id=\"" + id01 + "\" " + style01 + "top: "+ top01 +"; left:" + left01 + "\"><span>" + id01 + "</span></div>";}

        setTimeout(function() {alert("ok");
        }, 2000); 
*/
    }
    document.getElementById("block01").style.opacity = "1";
    document.getElementById("block01").style.backgroundColor = "transparent";
    document.getElementById("block01").innerHTML = grid01html;
    repeatGSC01(0);
//developer code tests here
//    document.getElementById("t001").value = grid01html;
    appendAttempt01(grid01html); 
    openDoor01();
}
function appendAttempt01(grid01html) {
 
    var search01 = "<div id=\"gridCell015\"";
    var search02 = "</div>";
    var grid01split = grid01html.split(search01);
    var gridPart01 = grid01split[0];
    var gridEdit01 = grid01split[1];
    gridEdit01 = gridEdit01.split(search02);
    var elToInsert01 = search01 + gridEdit01[0] + search02;

    search01 = "<div id=\"gridCell016\"";
    grid01split = grid01html.split(search01);
    gridEdit01 = grid01split[1];
//var gridPart02 is here, and finished, below, in another part
    var gridPart02 = gridEdit01;
    var gridEdit02 = gridEdit01.split(search02);
//note: the ending var search02 = "</div>" is not included in var elToInert02 because it is included later in var gridPart02, below.
    var elToInsert02 = search01 + gridEdit02[0] + search02;

    search01 = "<div id=\"gridCell025\"";
    grid01split = grid01html.split(search01);
//gridPart02, resumed
    gridPart02 = gridPart02.split(search01);
    gridPart02 = gridPart02[0];
    gridPart02 = gridPart02.split(search02);
    gridPart02[0] += "<#>";
    gridPart02 = gridPart02.join(search02);
    var search03 = "<#>" + search02;
    gridPart02 = gridPart02.split(search03);
    gridPart02 = gridPart02[1];
//  document.getElementById("t001").value = gridPart02;
    gridEdit01 = grid01split[1];
    gridEdit01 = gridEdit01.split(search02);
    var elToInsert03 = search01 + gridEdit01[0] + search02;

    search01 = "<div id=\"gridCell026\"";
    grid01split = grid01html.split(search01);
    gridEdit01 = grid01split[1];
    //don't split it here, that's the key; because splitting search02 ("</div>") here, 
    //splits every div element in gridPart02 into an array, split at that syntax of "</div>".
    //If you don't split it here, then var gridEit01 = gridPart02. Therefore, I split it with a new variable -> var gridEdit02.
    var gridEdit02 = gridEdit01.split(search02);
    var gridPart03 = gridEdit01;
    gridPart03 = gridPart03.split(search02);
    gridPart03[0] += "<#>";
    gridPart03 = gridPart03.join(search02);
    var search03 = "<#>" + search02;
    gridPart03 = gridPart03.split(search03);
    gridPart03 = gridPart03[1];

    //do not insert var search02 here, becuase it's part of var gridPart02, due to not being split (ref. "don't split here...", above).
    var elToInsert04 = search01 + gridEdit02[0] + search02;

    var elements01 = elToInsert01 + elToInsert02 + elToInsert03 + elToInsert04;
    
//  document.getElementById("t001").value = elements01;

    var style01 = "style=\"border: 0px solid yellow; background-color: transparent; z-index: 3; position: absolute;\"";
    var newDiv01 = "<div id=\"door01rotater\" style=\"border: 0px solid orange; position: absolute; z-index: 2;\"><div id=\"door01\" " + style01 + ">" + elements01 + "</div></div>";
    grid01html = gridPart01 + newDiv01 + gridPart02  + gridPart03;
    document.getElementById("block01").innerHTML = grid01html;
//document.getElementById("t001").value = grid01html;
}
function openDoor01() {
/*
    var leftTop, leftBottom, rightTop, rightBottom;
    var style01;
    style01 = "style=\"width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: black; opacity: 1;";
    leftTop = "<div " + style01 + " border-left: 4px outset brown; border-top: 4px outset brown; opacity: .7; \" ></div>";
    leftBottom = "<div " + style01 + " border-left: 4px outset brown; border-bottom: 4px outset brown; opacity: .7; \" ></div>";
    rightTop = "<div " + style01 + " border-top: 4px outset brown; border-right: 4px outset brown; opacity: .7; \" ></div>";
    rightBottom = "<div " + style01 + " border-right: 4px outset brown; border-bottom: 4px outset brown; opacity: .7; \" ></div>";

    document.getElementById("gridCell015").innerHTML = leftTop;
    document.getElementById("gridCell016").innerHTML = rightTop;
    document.getElementById("gridCell025").innerHTML = leftBottom;
    document.getElementById("gridCell026").innerHTML = rightBottom;

    document.getElementById("gridCell015").style.opacity = "1";
    document.getElementById("gridCell016").style.opacity = "1";
    document.getElementById("gridCell025").style.opacity = "1";
    document.getElementById("gridCell026").style.opacity = "1";

    document.getElementById("gridCell015").style.borderBottom = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell015").style.borderRight = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell016").style.borderBottom = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell016").style.borderLeft = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell025").style.borderTop = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell025").style.borderRight = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell026").style.borderTop = "0";
    document.getElementById("gridCell026").style.borderLeft = "0";
*/


    var door01 = document.getElementById("door01");
    //door01.style.backgroundColor = "tan";
    var vars01 = wAndH01();
    var width01 = vars01[0];
    var height01 = vars01[1];
    var width02 = width01 * 2;
    var height02 = height01 * 2;
    var width02px = width02 + "px";
    var height02px = height02 + "px";
    door01.style.width = width02px;
    door01.style.height = height02px;
    var height01px = height01 + "px";
    var width04px = (width01 * 4) + "px";
    var top01 = height01px;
    var left01 = width04px;
    door01.style.top = 0;//was var = top01, changed it to use rotate3d with id=door01rotater
    door01.style.left = width02px;//was left01, changed it to use rotate3d with id=door01rotater
    var rotater01 = document.getElementById("door01rotater");
    rotater01.style.width = width04px;
    rotater01.style.height = height02px;
    var rotLeft = (width01 * 2) + "px";
    var rotTop = height01 + "px";
    rotater01.style.left = rotLeft;
    rotater01.style.top = rotTop;
    proportionateChange01(top01, left01);
    moveDoor01();
    movePyramid01(0);
}
function wAndH01() {
    var width01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientWidth;
    width01 = Number(width01);
    width01 = width01 / 10;
    var width01px = width01 + "px";
    var height01 = document.getElementById("block01").clientHeight;
    height01 = Number(height01);
    height01 = height01 / 4;
    return [width01, height01];
}
function proportionateChange01(top01, left01) {
// to change positions, of the child nodes of id=door01, proportionate to the change in position of their parent (id=door01)
//this function gives top and left variables for id=door01, and it moves the following grid cells (child nodes of id=door01) proprionately
    top01 = top01.split("px");
    top01 = top01[0];
    left01 = left01.split("px");
    left01 = left01[0];

    var cell015 = document.getElementById("gridCell015");
    var cell016 = document.getElementById("gridCell016");
    var cell025 = document.getElementById("gridCell025");
    var cell026 = document.getElementById("gridCell026");

    var vars01 = wAndH01();
    var width01 = vars01[0];
    var height01 = vars01[1];

    cell015.style.top = 0;
    cell015.style.left = 0;
    cell016.style.top = 0;
    var width01px = width01 + "px";
    cell016.style.left = width01px;
    var height01px = height01 + "px";
    cell025.style.top = height01px;
    cell025.style.left = 0;
    cell026.style.top = height01px;
    cell026.style.left = width01px;
/*
    cell015top = Number(top01) + 0 + "px"; // no change
    cell015left = Number(left01) + 0 + "px"; // no change
    cell016top = Number(top01) + 0 + "px"; // no change
    cell016left = Number(left01) + Number(width01) + "px";
    cell025top = Number(top01) - Number(height01) + "px";
    cell025left = Number(left01) + 0 + "px"; //no change
    cell026top = Number(top01) + Number(height01) + "px";
    cell026left = Number(left01) + Number(width01) + "px";

    cell015.style.top = cell015top;
    cell015.style.left = cell015left;
    cell016.style.top = cell016top;
    cell016.style.left = cell016left;
    cell025.style.top = cell025top;
    cell025.style.left = cell025left;
    cell026.style.top = cell026top;
    cell026.style.left = cell026left;
*/
}
function moveDoor01(x01) {
    if(x01 == undefined) {x01 = 0;}
    else if(x01 >= 180) {return null;}
    else {x01 = x01;}
    var rotater01 = document.getElementById("door01rotater");
    var x02 = x01 + "deg";
    var style01 = "rotate3d(0, 1, 0, " + x02 + ")";
    rotater01.style.transform = style01;
    repeatMove01(x01);
}
function repeatMove01(x01) {
    x01 = x01 + 5;
    setTimeout(function() {
        moveDoor01(x01);
    }, 50);
}
function movePyramid01(x01) {
//transform: rotate3d(0.48723, 0, 0, -462.869deg);
    var pyramid01 = document.getElementById("solidCube01");
    var left01 = pyramid01.style.left;
    left01 = left01.split("px");
    left01 = left01[0];
    var deg01, deg02;
    var xAxis01 = 0, xAxis01px;
    var xAxis02 = 0;
    x01 = Number(x01);
    deg01 = -462.869;
    var end01 = 55;
    end01 = Number(end01);
    if(x01 == 0) {x01 = 1;}
    if(x01 <= end01) {
        deg01 = Number(deg01);
        deg01 = deg01 + (x01 * .01);
        deg02 = deg01 + "deg";
        xAxis01 = Number(xAxis01);
        xAxis01 = xAxis01 + (x01 * .002);
        left01 = Number(left01);
        xAxis02 = (left01 + (x01 * .196)) + "px";
        if(x01 > 45) {xAxis02 = (left01 + (x01 * .1)) + "px";}
        rot01 = "rotate3d(0.48723, "+xAxis01+", 0,"+deg02+")";
        pyramid01.style.transform = rot01;
        pyramid01.style.left = xAxis02;
        setTimeout(function(){repeatMovePyramid01(x01)}, 50);
    }
    
    else if(x01 > end01) {return null;}
}
function repeatMovePyramid01(x01) {
    x01 = Number(x01);
    x01 += 2;
    movePyramid01(x01);
}
function gridStyleChange01(x01) {
//    border: 0px dotted gray;
    var id01 = "gridCell0";
    var id02, el01;
    var i;
    i = x01;
    i = Number(i);
    i = i + 1;
    var length01 = 41;
//gridCell0" + i; where i = 1, and the length = 41, so 40 grid cells
//    for(i = 1; i < length01; i++) {
    if(i >= 41) {
        document.getElementById("p301").innerHTML = "<p style=\"background-color: black; border: 8px outset #808080; opacity: .9; padding: 4px;\">This simulation is a work in progress. This is the end of this simulation, at this time. Look forward to helping to fund a full time effort.</p>";
        var el02 = document.getElementById("text301");
        document.getElementById("d302").style.top = "5%";
        el02.style.border = "8px inset #808080";
        el02.value = "";
        el02.style.fontSize = "large";
        el02.style.fontWeight = "0";
        return null;
    }
    if(i < 41) {
        id02 = id01 + i;
        el01 = document.getElementById(id02);
        el01.style.border = "1px outset #808080";
        //setTimeout(function(){var x = 0;}, 50);
    }
    repeatGSC01(i);
//    }
}
function repeatGSC01(x01) {// repeat "gridStyleChange01"
    setTimeout(function(){gridStyleChange01(x01)}, 50);
}
function textPut01() {
    var val01 = document.getElementById("d302").innerHTML;
    var length01 = val01.length;
    length01 = Number(length01);
    if(length01 >= 100000) {
        localStorage.setItem("dataVal01", val01);
    }
    else if(length01 >= 100001) {
        return null;
    }
}
